Summary: slow black triangle with red blinking lights on the corners
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Grayson
There were no other sightings in Grayson on or around September 11th 2011
divs: Sighting Detailsi was sitting in my car outside of the funeral home and all my family where still inside, the car was facing the woods as i looked up i saw a huge black triangle moving very slowly the craft was very close it was just above the the building there was lights on each corner of the triangle at first they were constant then they began to blink and flash red and yellow as it got right over the the building.. i watched it the whole way until it went across into the other treeline and got out of sight.. and i also took video with my phone but its really unclear
